SELECT ID_NOTICE /* 공지사항ID */ , DS_TITLE /* 제목 */ , DS_NOTICE /* 공지내용 */ , DECODE(FG_OPEN_PORTAL,'Y','게시','미게시') AS FG_OPEN_PORTAL /* 게시여부 */ , TO_CHAR(DT_START, 'YYYY-MM-DD') || ' ~ ' || TO_CHAR(DT_END, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS DT_START /* 공지기간 */
, CASE WHEN DT_START < SYSDATE AND SYSDATE < DT_END THEN 0 ELSE 1 END AS ORD
, SU.USER_NM AS NM_REG_EMP , TO_CHAR(DT_REG, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS DT_REG /* 등록일 */ FROM TBS_NOTICE TN LEFT OUTER JOIN SYS_USER SU ON SU.USER_ID = TN.ID_REG_EMP WHERE 1 = 1
AND DT_REG >= TO_DATE (#{DT_REG_START} || ' 00:00:00', 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') /* 기간검색(FROM) */
AND DT_REG <= TO_DATE (#{DT_REG_END} || ' 23:59:59', 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') /* 기간검색(TO) */
AND (DS_TITLE LIKE '%' || #{DS_TITLE} || '%' OR DS_NOTICE LIKE '%' || #{DS_TITLE} || '%')
AND FG_OPEN_PORTAL = 'Y' AND TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') BETWEEN TO_CHAR(DT_START, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND TO_CHAR(DT_END, 'YYYY-MM-DD')
AND FG_DEL = 'N' ORDER BY FG_OPEN_PORTAL, DT_REG DESC
